short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides insight on technology usage for school districts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The StudentDPA Chrome Extension is specifically designed for subscribing districts of StudentDPA and their technology directors to seamlessly monitor and analyze the applications used by teachers and students. With just a click, gain a clear overview of all educational technologies utilized across your schools, enabling informed decisions and proactive management

Key Features:

- App Detection: Automatically identify and list all educational apps running on any webpage visited within your districtâ€™s network.
- Privacy Compliance: Use the gathered app usage data to facilitate DPA requests with app vendors streamlining compliance with district and regulatory standards.
- Secure and Private: Designed with privacy in mind, our tool ensures that data collection and analysis are conducted securely, respecting both user confidentiality and district policies.

Ideal for district technology leaders, the StudentDPA Chrome Extension not only simplifies the discovery and analysis of educational apps but also supports the crucial task of safeguarding student data privacy. Elevate your district's technology management and compliance with just one extension.
